hero.title: Fast Professional Quotes
hero.description: QuoteFast streamlines your quoting process—no unnecessary complexity, just the essential features to create, track, and manage professional price quotes effortlessly.

features.title: Powerful Quote Management Features
features.subtitle: Start simply and scale as your quoting needs grow

smartQuoteBuilder.title: Smart Quote Builder
smartQuoteBuilder.simplicity: 4-Step Simplicity: Configure → Add Items → Set Terms → Review
smartQuoteBuilder.saveDrafts: Never Lose Progress: Save drafts mid-quote and resume later
smartQuoteBuilder.livePreview: Live PDF Preview: Watch your quote transform into a polished PDF as you type

export.title: Professional PDF Exports
export.description: Instantly download quotes as polished PDF documents ready for your clients

template.title: Professional Quote Templates
template.description: Start quoting immediately using our professionally designed, free basic template

setup.title: Instant Setup
setup.description: Start creating and managing your quotes instantly, no setup needed

devices.title: Accessible Anywhere
devices.description: Manage quotes seamlessly from desktop, tablet, or mobile devices

security.title: Data Security First
security.description: Keep your business data safe with robust encryption and privacy standards

streamlinedWorkflow.title: Simplify Your Workflow
streamlinedWorkflow.description: Automate your quote creation process with our 4-step simplicity approach and reduce manual work by up to 80%.

professionalTemplates.title: Ready-to-Use Templates
professionalTemplates.description: Choose from a variety of professionally designed templates that match your brand with live PDF preview as you type.

continuousWork.title: Never Lose Progress
continuousWork.description: Never lose progress with our draft saving feature - save mid-quote and resume later, even on different devices.

productDatabase.title: Integrated Product Database
productDatabase.description: Save and easily reuse your product pricing, ensuring accuracy and saving valuable time.

instantUpdates.title: Quick and Easy Updates
instantUpdates.description: Effortlessly update prices or terms across quotes with just a few clicks.

about.title: About QuoteFast
about.description: The Simplest Quote Management Software for Entrepreneurs
about.introduction: QuoteFast simplifies quote creation and management for small business owners, freelancers, and contractors. Replace complex spreadsheets and cumbersome CRMs with an easy-to-use solution designed to save you time, reduce errors, and help you focus on growing your business.

challenge.title: Common Challenges in Quote Management
challenge.subtitle: Do these quoting headaches sound familiar?

solution.title: How QuoteFast Solves These Issues
solution.description: QuoteFast is built to streamline your quoting process with speed and accuracy, removing unnecessary complexity.
solution.subtitle: Essential Features You'll Love:
solution.subDescription: Our mission: Keep QuoteFast simple, intuitive, and indispensable for every small business.

lookingForward.title: Future-Proofing QuoteFast
lookingForward.description: QuoteFast evolves with your feedback. Share your needs and help shape the perfect quoting tool.
lookingForward.subDescription: Our mission: Keep QuoteFast simple, intuitive, and indispensable for every small business.

cta.title: Ready to Simplify Your Quoting?
cta.description: Start managing quotes smarter today. Join small businesses already saving hours every week with QuoteFast.

dashboard.overview: Here's what's happening with your business

form.subtitle: We value your feedback. Fill out the form below to get in touch with our team.

form.successDetail: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.errorDetail: Please try again or contact us directly.

message.title: Your Message
message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your experience with QFast or how we can help you...
message.template:
Hi there,

I'd like to provide feedback about QFast. 

I've been using the application for [time period], and I wanted to share my experience with:

1. What I like:
- 
- 

2. What could be improved:
- 
- 

Thank you for your consideration.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

errors.generic: Failed to send message. Please try again.

firstName.title: Your First Name
firstName.description: Please provide your personal first name, not your company name.

company.title: Company Name (Optional)
company.description: If you're contacting us on behalf of a company, please provide its name.

email.title: Your Email Address
email.description: We'll use this to respond to your message. We won't share it with third parties.

message.title: Your Message
message.description: Please be as specific as possible about what you want to share with us.

quote.termsIntro: Define the standard terms and conditions that will appear on your quotes. These will be displayed at the bottom of each quote document.

quote.termsHelp: These terms will appear at the bottom of all quotes
quote.termsHeaderHelp: This text will appear above your terms and conditions
quote.instructionsHelp: These instructions will appear alongside your terms and conditions

home.title: Fast & Professional Quote Management Software | QuoteFast
home.description: Quickly create and manage professional quotes with QuoteFast—simplified quote management software built specifically for small businesses, freelancers, and contractors.
home.keywords: quote management software, professional quotes, small business quoting tool, proposal software, estimate creator, quote generator, quote templates

quickSearch.title: Lightning-Fast Search
quickSearch.description: Find clients in 3 keystrokes: Search through thousands of records faster than typing "Smith".

duplicateDetection.title: Duplicate Prevention
duplicateDetection.description: Duplicate Force Field: Get real-time alerts that prevent accidental client clones.

pdfExport.title: One-Click Export
pdfExport.description: 1-Click Export: Download client-ready PDFs with perfect formatting every time.

versionedEditing.title: Versioned Editing
versionedEditing.description: Edit Without Tears: Revise existing quotes while preserving original versions.

quoteManagement.title: Quote Management System
quoteManagement.subtitle: Organize, Track, and Analyze Your Quotes

tracking.title: Comprehensive Quote Tracking
tracking.description: Keep track of all your quotes in one place with status indicators for draft, sent, accepted, and rejected quotes.

versioning.title: Smart Quote Versioning
versioning.description: Create multiple versions of the same quote without losing previous iterations, perfect for negotiations and revisions.

statusUpdates.title: Automatic Status Updates
statusUpdates.description: Update quote status with one click and automatically notify clients when quotes are accepted or require changes.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Access detailed analytics on quote performance, acceptance rates, and average time to acceptance.
